whoAmI.title: Developer
description: I am a passionate Frontend developer with a clear love for React.
I love creating components, or entire websites, utilizing SCSS or Styled Components and am always excited to find new ways of developing.

whoAmI.title: Climber
description: After work, my heart primarily beats for climbing, or more specifically for bouldering. I have been doing this sport since the age of 13 and could not imagine a life without it anymore.

whoAmI.title: Consultant at Aclue
description: I am currently employed at Aclue, working 40 hours each week as a Frontend consultant. Since my start on the 01.03.2022, I have been working on a project for OTTO. The project contains the aiding of the creation, as well as the maintanance and documentation of a design system based on MUI.

responsibilities: Maintanance on a design system for OTTO
Support for questions regarding the design system
Development with React, Typescript, Firebase and Ionic
Management of the page and continuous updates
Integration with Netlify CMS to enable their team in making independant content updates
Creation of image templates for Instagram
Aiding of the transformation of the Yoga center to remote during Corona times
Graphic enhancement of MS PowerPoint slides
Creation of Stencils and Templates in Sketch
